data.title: Macrolife by George Zebrowski: Fine Hardcover (1979) 1st Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Harper & Row, Publishers - 1979 - Condition: Fine - Fine - AUTHOR'S PRESENTATION COPY STATE, LETTERED SIGNED STATE. Limited to only 26 copies SIGNED AND LETTERED by the author on his specially produced and tipped-in plate. This is copy lettered "S". This is the only state of the first edition to have a laid-in Errata Slip. A long-term view of human and natural history. Book Condition: Fine: A sharp tight signed copy. One fold (produced by author) in Errata Slip to allow it to be laid in. / DJ Condition: Fine: A sharp bright dust jacket. Not price-clipped. Mylar cover. - Macrolife
